column4: when you say "6.06 release will be supported for 3 years", does that mean when Firefox and other apps come out with a new release 6.06 will get the upgrade, or do you mean it just get security fixes for 3 years?
Security fixes - though any point releases for Firefox (like 1.5.0.10, if and when it comes out) will likely be uploaded to 6.06 because that's the easiest way to do it
there's no reason for you to upgrade every 6 months
you can stick with dapper for as long as 3 years - except the latest and greatest software won't be (easily) available to you
